I do NOT recommend this game. there is SO many bugs to this game and the hitboxes are crazy! and also its trying to make me repurchase it after i have so many hours on it- like what? no thank you. give me my game back NOW. <3

Bought this game in 2017 and after 3 years I opened steam and it said "Purchase" instead of "Play". Shit game full of bugs and now I need to buy it again to play? I have 107.6hrs on record and 10.0hrs last two weeks. THANKS DBD TEAM. I can choose Play Now from the store but it doesn't load the game, Also in the store it says it is indeed in my library but if I check for it its not there anymore.

既に購入し、数回遊んだあと一旦アンインストールしました。
その後、もう一回DLしようと思ったのですがライブラリに表示されません。
ストアのページに来たらライブラリに存在します。と表示されており、これ以上どうやって手を打ったらいいかわかりません。
これってバグなのでしょうか。
ゲーム自体は楽しいのでオススメです。

seriously wish i hadn't wasted this much of my life on this idiotic game, but oh well. 

pros: none, there's none at this point anymore, quicker lobbies ain't worth the anal destruction you get playing this game. 
cons: everything. tunneling, slugging, camping with their fucking tents. same build over and over and over again. my sodium level has never been this high before.

Edit in 2022: This game has gotten much worse, literally every game is slugging, camping, and tunneling. Not worth the money, or time.
Very fun game when the killer doesnt face camp you.
マッチングの設定が変わってしまって、ランクやレベルが低いキラーでも高ランク帯のサバイバーとマッチするようになってしまったり、逆もまた然りであまり楽しめないかもしれません。私は楽しくプレイさせてもらってますがあまりお勧めしません(笑)
